file_content.text: Excellent work. Better than I would've done, I have no doubt.
Most of the mercs have been recalled to the volcanic base. Our forces can deal with the remainder so you won't have to.
Do away with some of those mercenaries and we'll have room for our forces to land.
A whole bunch of Jedi got called over to the Archives. They're about to find everything you planted there.
That data you planted at Telemur has got the civilians spooked. They think the mercs will flatten another mesa. We'll need to coax them out.
If you're going to coax those civilians out, you'll have to thin the mercenary herd first. Not that you'll mind, I'm sure.
Perfect. These mercenaries are doing exactly what we framed them for at the Hutt stronghold!
Access a terminal and patch it into the network. It'll leave a clear trail, sell our deception all the better.
That dissonance wave you made at the mesa drill is really going to sell these thumpers.
We have to really sell the danger from the thumpers. Place some charges in the nearby gorge--that ought to do it.
Mercs are being recalled to the Fingers mesas. You're all clear.
I'm intercepting chatter. Heavy merc activity at the next platform.
The mercs have control of the platform. You'll have to get the blasting caps from them to fire the drill.
It appears the mercs are looking for sources of isotope-5 to plunder for themselves.
Too bad for them you destroyed that abandoned mining drill. Good on you.
You'll need to wipe any record of that abandoned drill platform or they might get wise to our operations here.
The records you planted at Frinn Mesa should now be here as well. Let's make sure they've propagated through the network.
Brilliant. Simply brilliant. It's truly an honor to be working with you.
You sewed that one right up. Fabulous.
How do you do it? Fantastic. Really.
Took care of that, didn't you? Great work.
Now that was impressive. You make it look so easy.
Again--brilliant. We are so close now. Just one final task. Bit of a doozy, but I know you'll manage. Updated coordinates for you.
Perfect! That was perfect. We're not quite out of the woods yet, however. Got a few more tasks, if you please.
Bang-up job! But, listen--now the mercs are trying to get their paws on some isotope-5. Can't allow that. Sending coordinates now.
That's it. That's the lot of it! Oh, good show. You can come on back up now--at your leisure, of course.
